title: Exercise: Create a Basic Dynamic Workspace

questions.question: You could change this workspace to always write data in the same format but still adopt the schema of whatever incoming data was used in the reader.
Choosing Dynamic Schema under Workflow Options for Generate Workspace means the workspace will...
options: Read in whatever data it's given in a particular format and write it out using the same schema.
Read in data matching a list of feature type names and write it out using a user-defined schema.
Read in data matching a list of feature type names and write it out using the same schema.
Read in whatever data it's given in a particular format and write it out using a user-defined schema.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of the dynamic reader feature type in a newly created dynamic workspace?
options: It shows a list of attributes if you expand it.
It has a Merge Feature Type option.
